text.div:
DocumentEntry.languageCode

Document language as per Annex 3  EPRO-FDHA. Defines the language in which the document was written.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.316
  • Include these codes as defined in urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.316
